Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Harrison/Loomis
ShortDescription: Westbound 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Loomis, Van Buren, Ashland, and Harrison due to, street blockage near Harrison/Loomis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Loomis, Van Buren, Ashland, and Harrison due to, street blockage near Harrison/Loomis.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delay following earlier police activity at Halsted. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running with residual delay following earlier police activity at Halsted.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
